data.name: Freiwillig
data.detailed_description:
Join the ranks of the volunteer fire department in Tübingen, Germany, and defend the city from evil-doers through arcade puzzle action!

The Firefighter Duel

Rotate and drop the falling blocks to create reaction chains for big points! Fire ignites bombs, toasts marshmallows, and burns wood. Water extinguishes fire. Ice extinguishes fire and melts into water. Water, wood, and brick clear if five or more are connected.

Story Mode

Play as one of the brave men or women (or cats in human disguise) in the Tübingen fire department and duel your way through a deep plot that threatens the city!

Infinity Mode

Go for a high score on your own, but beware: the game gets faster and more difficult the longer you play!

data.short_description: Join the ranks of the volunteer fire department in Tübingen, Germany, and defend the city from evil-doers through arcade puzzle action! Use the falling blocks to create reaction chains for big points!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo e4600 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4600
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon x1650
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 750Ti or Radeon HD 7770
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
